overview: A three-part, social drama on parent-child relationships, it stars the Philippine moviesâ€™ most beautiful face, Amalia Fuentes as the Phaedra-like, upper-crust stepmother who falls in love with her stepson, the adorable Boots Anson Roa as the slum mother who has to choose between her bastard son and her good-for-nothing love, the alluring Pilar Pilapil as the social climbing fashion model who belittles her sacrificing adoptive parent.
tagline: How Bold Is Bold? The night holds a thousand secrets for these three women.
title: Isang Gabi... Tatlong Babae!
